header.description: I've been crafting custom web solutions and sharing insights about freelance development since 2006. I'm passionate about designing web apps, from UI/UX concepts to solving real-life complex problems with code. Feel free to contact me!

paragraphs: I'm a **freelance full-stack developer** based in Paris, France, building web and mobile experiences since 2006. Over the years, I've had the chance to work with major companies as well as startups.

I love turning ideas into real, working things. Whether it's crafting a slick UI, architecting a complex backend, or solving tricky problems with code: I'm in. These days, I'm especially excited about **Next.js**, **React Native**, and exploring how AI is reshaping the way we build software.

When I'm not coding, I'm probably making electronic music with Ableton Live and way too many VSTs, reading AI research papers, or cuddling my cats. There's something about sound design that scratches the same creative itch as programming.
Got a project in mind? **Let's talk.**

outOfBurn.title: I'm currently working on my own project called **Out Of Burn**: a wellness coaching app for **web, iOS, and Android** designed to help people recover from and prevent burnout.

faq.title: Curious Questions?
faq.subtitle: Everything you wanted to know about my work

items.question: How long have you been in tech?
items.answer: I've been in tech for **19+ years**, professionally since 2006! I started with video production and event management back in 2005, then taught myself web development in 2006. Since then, I've accumulated **11+ years of full-stack JavaScript experience**, worked with **50+ enterprise clients**, and even spent 2 years as a WebGL developer at **Kogama/ABOX in Stockholm**. It's been quite a journey!

items.question: What's your main expertise?
items.answer: I'm a **Senior Full-Stack JavaScript Developer** with deep expertise in modern web technologies. My core skills include **React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript**. But I also have strong secondary skills in **UI/UX design, WebGL development, real-time systems**, and video/streaming technologies. I'm particularly excited about **AI-assisted development** ‚Äî it's completely transformed my workflow!

items.question: Where are you based and what's your work setup?
items.answer: I'm based in **Paris, France** (Saint-Maur-des-Foss√©s, √éle-de-France). I've been a **freelancer for 15+ years**, which means I can work with clients anywhere! Whether it's remote collaboration with international teams or on-site work in Paris ‚Äî I'm flexible. I speak **French natively** and have **professional English proficiency** (B2 level).

items.question: What kinds of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I love variety! I've built **real-time dashboards, CRMs, live video interfaces, e-commerce platforms**, and complex business applications. Right now, I'm working on **Out Of Burn** ‚Äî my own AI-powered wellness app for burnout prevention. I've also done R&D on **high-performance cartographic visualization** with deck.gl and Mapbox. From startups to enterprise clients like large French companies ‚Äî I handle it all!

items.question: How do you use AI in your development workflow?
items.answer: AI has become an essential part of how I work! I use tools like **GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude Code**, and others daily. I'm also experienced with the broader AI ecosystem ‚Äî **LangChain, vector databases (Pinecone, pgvector)**, and various LLM providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Mistral. This lets me not only code faster but also build **AI-powered features** into the applications I create.
